item.title: The Shakespearean Mouse
item.author: NozZy
item.description: BackdoorCTF 2023 - The Shakespearean Mouse Category Forensics Description wend f’rward with this quest of yours, f’r thee shalt findeth the flag at the endeth Attachments: https://staticbckdr.infoseciitr.in/shakespeareanmouse.zip Files shakespeareanmouse.zip Difficulty 496 points Author: cy4n1d3 Write up The Shakespearan Langage Inside the zip file we got two files: out.bmp, and The Backdoor Lore containing only text, at first sight, the script of drama play. I rapidly think of a so of esoteric language, like Poetic or Whitespace, which are programming languages hidden in sor of “normal” text.
